During my time at the Hellenic Foundation for European and Foreign Policy (ELIAMEP), I worked closely with Manos Matsaganis (Head of the Greek and European economy observatory) to produce policy research focusing on the Greek economy. Our joint and my individual work can be found below:

## Short policy bulletins and media presence

### \* In - Focus

weekly policy bulletins (with M. Matsaganis) published at ELIAMEP's website (in English) as well as at Oikonomikos Tachydromos (in Greek)

### \* Bi-weekly articles

published at capital.gr (in Greek)
